name: happiness-build-script
description: Used to compile static assets for Shea's happiness GitHub page.

scripts.watch: node-sass --watch --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/main.scss css/main.css
scripts.css:sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/main.scss css/main.css
